column4: i upgraded 10.04 server to 10.10 and now the welcome message that appears when I ssh in is doubled. it shows the welcome for 10.10 and 10.04. how can i edit it so it only shows the 10.10 message?
if i manually edit that, will it screw anything up? and how does it generate the dynamic info like memory usage and other things?
don't know tbh, I have never cared enough to look into it =)
